title: Proton Pack: Standard Issue
description: Standard Issue Proton Pack, 100 of these ever made, newer model has much more market saturation.  This is a collector's item but also fully functional.  *Licensing fee for actual use not included

title: Ghost Trap 3000X
description: Standard Issue Ghost trap for catching ghosts.  Never look directly into the trap while it is open.

title: Proton Pack: 2.0
description: Upgraded Proton Pack, each made to order.  Feature several firing modes indluding: Slime, Ionic Blast, Proton Stream and EMP.  Cool down safety function, no license required.

title: PKE Meter
description: Standard issue PKE Meter.  Tracks negative energy particles in several different metrics.

title: Ecto Goggles (refurb)
description: *This is a used item.  Good mileage, 12 in stock.  No refunds.

title: Slime-resistant Coveralls and Protective Gear
description: Don't bust ghosts without it - these slime-resistant jumpsuits will protect any wearer from the mood swings associated with negative slime energy.  Kneepads/elbowpads/belt included.
